events.message: The insured contacted us to file a claim after a recent car collision involving their sedan.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident following review of the incident details.
An agent was assigned promptly to manage the investigation and communication with the insured.
The claim acknowledgment was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps.
Request for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates was issued to the claimant.
Submitted documents including police report and damage photos were received and logged successfully.
The agent began a thorough investigation of the auto accident claim based on submitted evidence.
The investigation was completed, confirming the claimant was not at fault in the collision.
A settlement offer covering the full cost of repairs was proposed to the insured.
The insured provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement terms.
Claim approval was granted after customer acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment for the vehicle repairs was issued to the insuredâ€™s preferred account.
The claim file was officially closed following resolution and payment issuance.
All documentation related to the auto accident claim was archived for future reference and compliance.
